resources.string: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Network error. The request took too long. Please try again.
There was an error on the server. Please try again later.
Server is under maintenance. Please try again later.
Could not find an app on this device for file type %1$s.
There was an error downloading the image.
This post is marked as NSFW
This post has been removed by the moderators of %1$s.
Pick a time to automatically refresh offline data.
This post has been locked by the moderators of %1$s. New comments cannot be posted.
This post was deleted by the person who originally posted it.
Error. The selected history item is corrupted and cannot be used.
You must sign in to perform that action.
Home page will be changed on next app start.
Unable to download image. Storage permission denied.

There is a mismatch between the instance the account was created on (%1$s) and the instance the action is taken on (%2$s).\nYou can fix this by either signing in to an account on the instance %2$s or by loading this page from the %1$s instance.
Timeout waiting for server. The server is likely overloaded.
Timeout trying to reach the server. The server is either overloaded or there is an issue with your internet connection.
Uses pure black as the background color
You did not make changes to any settings so nothing was saved.
Change and customize the app theme
Personalized theming based on your wallpaper
Material You is not supported by your device.
Customize the post and comments screen

By default, tapping a comment header will collapse a comment. Tapping the body of a comment will expand/collapse actions when \"Always show actions\" is disabled. Enabling this setting will cause taps on any part of a comment to collapse the comment. Actions can be toggled via long press.
Tell me what you think or report bugs
Filter posts based on title keywords
Filter posts based on the instance name
Filter posts based on the community name
Filter posts based on OP\'s name
Filter comments based on the instance name
Filter comments based on title keywords
Filter comments based on OP\'s name
Change settings related to downloading files
Change settings that are applied to specific communities.
Customize the comment list of posts
If enabled, a link button is always shown at the bottom of the post.
If enabled, tapping on the thumbnail will open the image in the image viewer. If disabled, long pressing an image will open the image in the image viewer instead.
See the people who helped translate the app
Adds a button to the post/comments screen that allow you to jump to the next or previous post.
While on the post screen, use the volume buttons to move to the next/previous comment.
Only show top level comments for posts by default
Links will open in the browser instead of in the app.
When enabled, the upvote and downvote counts are shown separately. When disabled, the combined score is shown instead.
Choose how instance names are displayed
Classic but with colors and dividers
Restore the state of a post when returning to a post. Enabling this may reduce performance.
Changes the position of some buttons to be more accessible for left-handed users.
Prevents the bottom navigation bar from hiding on scroll.
Tapping on a link opens a preview of the link before opening the link.
If disabled, crashes you encounter in the app will not be logged. Please consider reporting crashes to c/summit if you disable this setting.
Changing this setting requires a restart of the app.
Auto-collapse comments below some upvote percent
If enabled, your browsing history will be stored and shown on the history screen.
Change how you navigate the app
Enables customizations to the navigation bar.
When enabled, a bottom navigation bar is shown at the bottom for easy access to top level screens. When disabled, navigation options will be shown in the overflow menu instead.
See the state of user actions taken on this device.
When enabled, posts will be hidden if they are on the hidden post list.
If enabled, swipe back will show a preview of the action if the gesture would result in the user switching to a different app.
When enabled, more posts will be automatically be loaded when you are close to reaching the end of the list.
Adds a page number \"divider\" between pages.
This will remove %1$s posts from the hidden post list.
When enabled, a warning is shown when adding a comment to an old post or comment. This is helpful to avoid an accidental revival of a post.
Uses a brighter color as the background color
Move your settings between devices or back them up
Load/restore settings from a file, setting code or an internal setting backup.
Generate a code from all of your settings. This code can be saved to a file or shared and used to restore your settings at a later date or on another device.
Indicate posts and comments created by current user
When enabled, drafts of posts/comments are saved automatically if you navigate away from the create/edit post/comment screen without pressing send.
When enabled, profile icons will be shown for comments. May cause FPS lag.
See what settings are overridden and reset overridden settings.

Settings you change here will override the settings set outside of the per-account page. These overrides will only take effect when the associated account is the current account. You can reset any overridden settings in the \"Manage settings\" page.
Determines when the navigation rail is used instead of the bottom navigation menu.
Change which actions appear when a comment is expanded.
Change which actions appear under a post in the post screen.
When enabled, certain screens will utilize different layouts to try to use as much of the screen as possible.
When enabled, posts filtered by the filtering rules will appear as a collapsed item.
When enabled, images/gifs/videos within text will be shown as text links.
Notifications for accounts such as private messages or replies to posts.
Manage what notifications the app shows
Choose which accounts to check notifications for.
Unable to sent post due to %1$s. Message: %2$s
There doesn\'t seem to be anything here
Unable to mark message as read.
Please login to view your inbox.
Enter the 6-digit code generated by your authenticator app.
You have unsaved changes. Web preferences must be saved to the server in order for them to take effect.
Mark posts as read on scroll
If enabled, posts you scroll past will automatically be marked as read
Use gestures for actions instead of buttons
Take a photo and edit image
Error. Cannot load NSFW community when NSFW posts are hidden.

Your filters are too aggressive for this community/instance.An overly aggressive filter filters out too many posts resulting in little or no results. An aggressive filter can also negatively impact performance. Please edit your filters to be less aggressive or choose a different instance/community.
Your content type filters are too aggressive for this community/instance. Please relax your content type filters or choose a different community/instance.
Unable to add/remove user as moderator.
Please select at least one community to create a multi-community.
No icons found. Select some communities.
Multi-communities cannot be shared. Multi-communities are purely client-sided.
There are too many communities selected for this multi-community. The maximum number of communities per multi-community is %1$s.
You will lose your changes if you proceed. Do you want to continue?
The community \'%1$s\' was not found on this instance.
User is not the moderator of any communities.
This feature is unsupported by your Lemmy instance. This is likely because your instance version is too low. This feature requires the instance to be on %1$s or up.
Error. Unable to load this action.
You must sign in to create a post.
Purging will delete this item, and all its children from the database. You will not be able to recover the data. Use with extreme caution.
You are commenting on/replying to an old post/comment. It was published %1$s ago.
Input is not in a recognizable format.
Input is expected to be a JSON, however given input is not a json.
Input is not a recognizable settings JSON.
Please review the settings you are about to import.
Settings have been imported successfully. An app restart is required to apply certain settings. Restart now?
Added %1$s as moderator for the community %2$s.
Removed %1$s as moderator for the community %2$s.
Added %1$s as moderator for the instance %2$s.
Removed %1$s as moderator for the instance %2$s.
Undo ban on %1$s from the community %2$s.
Undo ban on %1$s from the instance %2$s.
Transferred ownership of the community %1$s to %2$s.
Unable to upload image due to an unknown issue.
There is an upload in progress. Do you want to proceed anyways?
This community has been removed by an admin. It will not be visible to regular users.
This community has been hidden by an admin. It will not be visible to regular users.
You can use saved images when creating a comment or post.
Browse different instances without an account.
User has no profile image set. The profile image you see is a placeholder inserted by Summit.
Used quick actions (drag items to reorder or remove)
Unused actions (drop below to hide action)
Set default sort order for this feed
Special thanks to the following patrons for this update
Account token has expired for account %1$s. Please sign in again.
This post has been filtered. Filter reason: %1$s.
Only moderators can post to this community
Reset all settings. A backup of your current settings will be saved before they are reset.
Settings have been cleared. An app restart is required to apply certain changes. Restart now?
You are about to reset your settings. A backup will be created before your settings are reset. Proceed?
Unique identifier for the community; cannot be changed.
Title of the community; can be changed.
This community has been deleted by it\'s creator. It will not be visible to regular users.
Removing a bookmark to a multi-community will delete the multi-community.
Choose an action to perform when the floating action button on the post list screen (button near the bottom of the screen) is long pressed.
Show edited time in the header for posts/comments.
The original image is too large to preview. A downscaled version is shown instead.
Image is too large to preview. Download the image and preview it in another app.
Customize the appearance of the post and comments screen
Hide UI by default in image viewer
Account switching cannot be performed when viewing an account specific post.
When enabled, the post feed will prefetch posts before they are needed to improve loading performance. This is recommended if you have a good internet connection.
You are viewing this post on the instance **%1$s** but you are currently signed in on **%2$s**.
Could not find post/comment on this instance.
Some conversations may be missing. This account has over %1$s messages and Summit currently only fetches the most recent %1$s messages. Conversations before %2$s will not be shown.
The FPS field indicates the maximum FPS of the recording. Based on the device hardware, it might not be possible to reach the FPS selected.

Screenshot recording success!

FPS: %1$s
Frame time (ms): %2$s
Time taken: %3$s
File size: %4$s
When enabled, read posts will be completely dimmed. If disabled, only the title of the post is dimmed.
When enabled, images will be uploaded to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) instead of Lemmy.
Controls which animations play in the app. A higher animation level means more animations are played.
You cannot perform actions within the context when composing a comment.

Controls how aggressively the app will cache network content. A relaxed caching policy will mean that the app will make network calls more frequently but the content may be more fresh. An aggressive cache policy will improve app performance at the cost of possibly stale content.
Use condensed style for comment header

Choose the instance you want to call home. For more information about the instances of Lemmy, visit [join-lemmy.org](https://join-lemmy.org/instances).\n\n[Don\'t know who to choose? Use the largest instance.](a)
Unable to resolve instance. Please double check instance entered.
**To join this server, you need to answer the following question, and wait to be accepted.**
Username too short. Minimum length %1$s characters.
Username too long. Max username length %1$s characters.
Password too short. Minimum length %1$s characters.
Password too long. Maximum length %1$s characters.
Instance requires captcha however no captcha is provided.
This instance is currently not accepting new users.
Email verification required. Please look for the verification email and click on the link within. \n\nIf you do not see the email within 10 minutes, check your spam or trash folders.
Your application as been submitted. You must wait for a site admin will need to approve your application before you can use your account.
An unexpected error has occurred during registration.
You must solve a captcha to sign up. Please enter the code from the image below.
